content: There are few memory tracers discussed/described since it is fairly easy to write one, could we have an official one or at least mention one/some?
Not an official solution but you may want to take a look at the Proxy Allocator from the alloc-compose-crate.
This allocator calls a callback for every method, while the callback is defined by a trait. The crate is maintained by me and I try to keep it on par with the official AllocRef trait.
